__e: Oh, 'twill not be new to you, young master, but to I, the discoveries I've made!
It's hard to see the silver lining, but think of the discoveries you made. About yourself and your life and your ex-wife.
Those are the kind of discoveries that lead one to question whether they were really using the tools in the ancient toolbox, or whether there was something else at work.
And as much as I don't want to believe it your husband's findings are hard to discount.
I can't make my own discoveries every now and again?
I brought you into one of the greatest discoveries of all ti...
The problem is William Thompson, being the lead scientist, he's going to have to present their findings and he's not happy about it.
So please, think of this as a week of discovery, and not just an excuse to miss class.
- Meaning that tonight was a night of firsts, and there's no reason that it has to stop.
